description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ka6e","text":"Simplified Gallyas-silver staining protocol that works for pathological staining in rodent and human tissue ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5qm2u","text":"Make 4% of NaOH (sodium hydroxide) - use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2lsfj","text":"Make 4% of NaOH (sodium hydroxide) – sodium hydroxide – this is in the Kentros lab make in fume hood, use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5reht","text":"1g NaOH + 25ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":5},{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qd93","text":"Make 2 x 600ml dH20 – use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci95j","text":"1.5g ammonium nitrate + 1.2g silver nitrate + 3.6g of 4%NaOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":56,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":29,"length":15},{"style":"italic","offset":45,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":56,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6na36","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cd3dj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":16,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":16,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6e4si","text":"Ammonium nitrate can cause an explosion with metals","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":17,"style":"bold"}],"key":"65aoa","text":"Reaction between silver nitrate and ethanol is explosive","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":17,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":36,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":31,"style":"italic"},{"length":1,"offset":40,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6r92s","text":"Reaction between silver nitrate and NaOH can form inflammable gases/vapors","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cqj1k","text":"Make acetic acid – use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"46en1","text":"0.5%: 3ml acetic acid in 597ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":12},{"style":"italic","offset":21,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50o3o","text":"0.1%: 0.6ml acetic acid in 600ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":12},{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ruco","text":"0.05%: 50ml 0.5% acetic acid + 450ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cavcc","text":"Make 0.2% potassium ferricyanide – can be stored up to a week, use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"58bmr","text":"0.6g potassium ferricyanide in 300ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"10lbv","text":"Make 0.5% sodium thiosulfate - use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7liu0","text":"1.5g sodium thiosulfate in 300ml H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that can be made in advance and stored in a fume hood
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dfmvb","text":"Make 25%, 50%, 70%, 95% and 100% ethanol ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1vlva","text":"Make pyridine + acetic acid - use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cro28","text":"100ml pyridine + 50ml acetic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":11},{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h6qf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"349t2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":8,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6rtdk","text":"Pyridine is incompatible with rubber, plastics, and metals! Very important to use butyl-rubber gloves with this chemical","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"26bcc","text":"Make A + B + C (1L) - use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"abmr4","text":"Make silver nitrate (add in this order) - use gloves, store in fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"408ql","text":"100ml dH20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33boc","text":"0.192g ammonium nitrate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93bga","text":"0.2g silver nitrate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab33m","text":"0.6ml of 4% NaOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e3pu","text":"pH must be 7.5 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e1tv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4q6e6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":16,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"72f0o","text":"Ammonium nitrate can cause an explosion with metals","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":17,"style":"bold"},{"length":8,"offset":36,"style":"bold"}],"key":"cpcg2","text":"Reaction between silver nitrate and ethanol is explosive","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":17,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":36,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bs8mq","text":"Reaction between silver nitrate and NaOH can form inflammable gases/vapors","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Solutions that need to be prepared on the same day of staining
